name: Fennec: Royal Edition
description:
• Do you like platform games?
  • Did you play NES games when you were young?
  • Do you like a challange?

If you answered to these questions affirmatively, you don't even have to think twice - Fennec: Royal Edition is the game for you!

Fennec: Royal Edition is the first part of the adventure of the hero from the land of Fenghdom. Secrets, enemies and 25 levels + 20 levels of DLC are waiting for you in it. Your task in this game is simple - jump, dodge, collect and reach the end of the level. Piece of cake, right? (I doubt it.)

Each stage of the game has different interaction elements that make each next level a different and fresh experience.

The game also includes an unlocked classic mode where you'll be able to play the 11 year old version of the game! (PC version only)
